data.actual_result: The minimum size warning does not go away unless you leave & re-enter the page
data.expected_result: Minimum size warning should disappear and be replaced with the Remove option
data.short_description: [Website Bug] Image minimum size warning doesn't go away
data.steps_to_repro: - Create an application - Go into the Bot settings panel and create a bot user - Go into Art Assets - Set a cover image under 512x512 in size to trigger the warning - Set another image that does meet the size requirement and observe
